backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor that includes the MixinStorage blob storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: deadline notifications, offline support, document upload UI, dashboard filtering, and responsive UI polish with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities for the Solar Panel Manager application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Solar Panel Manager application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with five routes, theme provider, notification hooks, offline sync, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ActiveFilterBadg: Displays active dashboard filters as removable badges with special handling for kW range display.
frontend/src/components/DashboardFilters: Sheet-based filter panel with controls for panel company selection, kW range slider, and project stage selection with active filter count badge.
frontend/src/components/DocumentList.tsx: Displays list of uploaded documents with download and delete actions, showing file metadata and empty state.
frontend/src/components/DocumentUploader: React component for uploading multiple documents (PDF, JPG, PNG) with drag-and-drop support, file preview list, progress tracking, and simulated upload functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright information and a branded link to caffeine.ai with dynamic year and app identifier.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header with responsive mobile menu, desktop nav links, global search input with live results dropdown, and theme toggle button.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps the app with Header, MobileNavigation, Footer, and renders child routes via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Reusable animated spinner component with configurable size (sm/md/lg) and custom className support.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Full-page loading state component displaying a large spinner with optional custom message.
frontend/src/components/MobileNavigation: Fixed bottom navigation bar for mobile devices with icons and labels for Dashboard, Customers, Tasks, and Reports.
frontend/src/components/NotificationPerm: Dismissible card prompt that appears after 3 seconds to request browser notification permissions for deadline reminders, with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Fixed alert component that monitors online/offline status and displays sync status with pending changes count.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonLoader.t: Collection of skeleton loading components (CardSkeleton, TableSkeleton, ListSkeleton) for displaying placeholder UI during data fetching.
frontend/src/components/UploadProgressBa: Progress bar component for file uploads with status indicators (uploading/complete/error) and color-coded visual feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeadlineNotificati: Hook that monitors task deadlines and sends browser notifications for tasks due within 24 hours, checking hourly and tracking already-notified tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalSearch.ts: Hook that filters customers by name, phone, panel company, or kW size based on search query with minimum 2-character threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineSync.ts: React hook that monitors online/offline status and automatically refetches all React Query queries when the browser comes back online.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjectFilters.ts: React hook for managing and applying filters (panel company, kW range, project stage) to project/customer data arrays.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching dashboard data, customers, tasks, and individual customer details, currently using mock data with TypeScript interfaces for solar installation CRM.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile optimizations, and utility classes for a solar CRM application.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDetailPage.ts: Customer detail page component displaying comprehensive customer information including contact details, solar system specs, tasks, documents, and timeline in a tabbed interface.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Customer list page with search functionality displaying customer cards in a responsive grid layout with filtering by name or phone number.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page component displaying project statistics (total customers, completed installations, pending KSEB/MNRE, total kW), today's tasks, overdue tasks, and high-priority tasks with filtering capabilities and active filter badges.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Reports page component showing business summary statistics including total customers, completed installations, pending KSEB/MNRE, total kW installed, and average system size with icon-based cards.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Tasks page component displaying a sortable list of tasks (by deadline or priority) with overdue indicators, customer names, deadlines, and priority badges.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, extended spacing/shadows, and animation keyframes for accordion and other UI components.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting the solar panel business management app architecture, 8-stage workflow, existing features (deadline reminders, offline support, document uploads, filtering, UI polish), and pending feature requests.
